## RequestManager.eth\_newBlockFilter property

Creates a filter in the node, to notify when a new block arrives. To check if the state has changed, call eth\_getFilterChanges.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
eth_newBlockFilter: () => Promise<Data>;
```
